definition: to invent and innovate/inventions and innovations
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
a wound/cut/injury/trauma
to begin/to initiate/to inaugurate/to start/to create
to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops

sentences.english: Article 13 For any identical invention-creations, only one patent right shall be granted.
sentences.chinese: 第十三條同樣的發明創造只能被授予一項專利。

sentences.english: Books were invented only recently in the long history of mankind.
sentences.chinese: 書本也是近代在人類漫長的歷史中發明創造的。

sentences.english: Indeed, our species ' social inventiveness is central to what it is to be human.
sentences.chinese: 確實，人類社會發明創造的能力纔是人是什麼的核心。

sentences.english: Beijing said it wanted to spur home-grown invention.
sentences.chinese: 北京方面說，它希望刺激國內的發明創造。

sentences.english: Over your lifetime, there are going to be a lot more inventions like this.
sentences.chinese: 在你們的一生中，會有許多這樣的發明創造。

sentences.english: Service invention system is scientific and technological progress and the social development of the product.
sentences.chinese: 職務發明創造制度是科技進步和社會發展的產物。

sentences.english: The present invention belongs to petroleum mechanical field, especially energy saving oil pumping machine .
sentences.chinese: 本發明創造屬於石油機械，尤其是節能抽油機。

sentences.english: That is, we have all the ideas and invent everything.
sentences.chinese: 我們擁有所有的思想和發明創造。

sentences.english: Such inventions represent a fundamental shift in the global order of innovation.
sentences.chinese: 這些發明創造代表着全球創新格局的一種根本性轉變。

sentences.english: New technology that hasn't even been dreamed of, let alone invented.
sentences.chinese: 新的科技還沒有被構想出來，又談何發明創造呢。

definition: (idiom) to use methods appropriate to the current situation
loss (of sth through natural disaster, theft etc) (law)
the four great Chinese inventions: paper, printing, magnetic compass and gunpowder
to prove/to confirm/to corroborate/convincing proof
to become a mere formality
to help a mother give birth
protectorate
electronics
slave-owning society (precedes feudal society 封建社會|封建社会 in Marxist theory)
bacteriophage/virus that infects bacteria
lit. pull one hair and the whole body moves/fig. a slight change will affect everything else/the butterfly effect
pinyin: qian1 yi1 fa4 er2 dong4 quan2 shen1

definition: (desired) effect/(expected) result/effective
legislation/constructing legal institutions
basic unit/fundamental building block
hunger strike
neighborly relations
